item.title: Topic Modeling with Networks
item.description: /* this chunnk of code centers all of the headings */ h1, h2, h3 { text-align: center; } Topic Model Networks A topic model put simply models the topics in a piece of text and the words that are associated with each topic. Naturally, words may fall in multiple topics and the model accounts for this by giving each topic a probability distribution over the words.
